entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Leamington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.5°C

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High 7.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating near noon then cloudy. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or drizzle. Low plus 3 with temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle late this evening and after midnight. Rain beginning after midnight. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Low plus 3 with temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. High 16.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming south 50 gusting to 70 then southwest 20 early in the afternoon. High 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023
